Name: Vispo - The Video Spot the Difference game.
About the game: Time to play a spot the difference game with a real difference. Videos levels. Well, somebody had to do it. Travel the world, past and present. True or imaginary. And find the differences in many beautiful, amazing videos and movies. Use Pinch/Zoom/, gamepad or mouse to aid your search. Tap on the differences when you find them. Over 120 levels and 20,000 different video frames of Spot the Difference goodness. No time limits. Use picture hints to solve the difficult puzzles. Scores saved, so play across multiple devices.
